pageContext.claim: “And now on Thursday, I go up another real great one. Another great one. Kristen Welker. She's a radical Democrat. Look at them, they're getting angry. She's a radical Democrat.”
pageContext.analysis: NBC's Kristen Welker is a professional journalist who Federal Election Commission records show has never made political contributions to candidates. Welker isn't registered to vote as a Democrat, either; she is listed as having no party affiliation. Her parents's contributions are irrelevant to how she would conduct her job as debate moderator; they were also not Democratic fundraisers.
